name: root
description: UI components for Vue.js and CSS framework agnostic
author: Walter Tommasi <tommsi20@gmail.com>

scripts.gen: npm run gen:types && npm run gen:volar && npm run gen:docs
scripts.publish: npm run publish --workspace @oruga-ui/oruga-next && npm run publish --workspace @oruga-ui/examples
scripts.publish:pre: npm run publish:pre --workspace @oruga-ui/oruga-next && npm run publish:pre --workspace @oruga-ui/examples
scripts.release: npm run version && npm run changelog
scripts.changelog: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && node .scripts/wait-confirm && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.postversion: echo "You can now publish your tag with 'git push --follow-tags'"
